text: Ra yadi mominiharuka kunai du'i samuha apasama lad'ihalchan bhane, yiniharuma melamilapa gara'ide'u, ra yadi e'uta samuhale arko samuhamathi jyadati gardacha bhane jyadati garnevalasita lada, yahamsam'ma ki tyo allahako adesatira pravrttahos, ani jaba pravrtta huncha bhane duvai samuhama insaphako satha apasama melamilapa gara'ide'u ra n'yaya garnu. Kinaki allaha n'yaya garneharula'i ruca'umdacha
